thread.title: Food Design by Francesca Zampollo
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Food Design by Francesca Zampollo

author: Food Design by Francesca Zampollo
title: Food Design by Francesca Zampollo
text: We'be been housesitting for about 8 months now, and we've have the most wonderful experiences. The site provides a wonderful platform and we've always had everything we needed. Just try it and you'll love it!
